pli-tv-bu-vb-pc54:2.3.2: “Testing” renders _paripuccha_. The basic meaning of _paripucchā_ is “to question” or “to ask”, as used for instance in [Bu Pc 71](pli-tv-bu-vb-pc71:1.19.1). Often, however, as in the present case, it refers to a teacher questioning his student, in the sense of finding out how much the student knows. In such cases I render the word as “testing”.
